id: scenario-public-observer-developer-interests-scenarios-educational-developer school partnership creates genuine community benefit
title: Developer school partnership creates genuine community benefit
description: Developer school partnership creates genuine community benefit
content:
Scenario: Developer school partnership creates genuine community benefit
    Given a responsible developer wants to genuinely support education
    And recognizes development affects school community
    When the Observer facilitates school-developer partnership
    Then the developer commits: after-school program space in community building
    And provides scholarship fund for district students
    And employs district graduates in construction and property management
    And partnership creates lasting educational community benefit
    And genuine engagement distinguishes from token gestures
